tree.name: Jonathan Kuminga
tree.tradeDescription: Hawks acquire Kuminga and Buddy Hield from Warriors for Kristaps Porzingis
tree.note: Former #7 pick, explosive athletic wing with star potential

assetsGivenUp.name: Kristaps Porzingis
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: Hawks acquired Porzingis from Celtics, sent Niang to BOS, Mann and #22 pick to BKN
assetsGivenUp.note: 2024 NBA Champion with Celtics, 7'2" unicorn big man

assetsGivenUp.name: Georges Niang
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Signed as free agent, later traded to Boston in Porzingis deal

assetsGivenUp.name: Terance Mann
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Clippers, later sent to Brooklyn in Porzingis deal
assetsGivenUp.note: Versatile wing, former Clipper playoff hero

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 #22 Pick
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Hawks' own 2025 first-round pick, sent to Brooklyn in Porzingis trade
assetsGivenUp.note: Hawks' draft capital used to acquire Porzingis - ORIGIN
